txt.en: 'I have tended many glades and gardens in my long life, and there are few I find more fair than Duillond.'
'Oft I think that the shadow which has fallen upon Ered Luin has brought with it a plague of weeds....'
'The pests and vermin of Ered Luin have grown to extraordinary size of late...I hope my gardens do not become infested.'
'My gardens contain many varieties of wildflowers...beautiful, are they not?'
